Package Agents

Class SyncAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Agents.SyncAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class SyncAgent
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is an agent handling synchronisation of information between the different nodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SyncAgent

        public SyncAgent​(Node node)
        Constructor for the SyncAgent. After setting its node variable to the node its running on, the SyncAgent will start its HttpServer. On receiving a "GET" request at "[nodeIP]:8082/fileList", the SyncAgent will respond with a JSONArray of all files in the system. On receiving a "DELETE" request at "[nodeIP]:8082/fileList/[filename]", the SyncAgent will remove the file from the system. After the Http server is setup, the SyncAgent will also setup its MulticastListener.
        Parameters:
        node - The node that this agent is associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • getLockOwner

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getLockOwner()
        Get the HashMap of files with the node that locked it.
        Returns:
        HashMap of files with the node that locked it.

      • run

        public void run()
        Regularly updates its own file list with the one from its next node. Starts the thread that listens for incoming multicast messages as well as the HttpServer. After these two threads are running, the SyncAgent starts regularly updating its own file list with the one from its next node.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • makeLocalList

        public void makeLocalList()
        Makes a list of files that the current node has.

      • getFileList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFileList()
        Returns the list of files in the system according to the this node.
        Returns:
        the list of files.

      • addLocalFile

        public void addLocalFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Updates the local list when a new local file gets added.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that was added.

      • deleteLocalFile

        public void deleteLocalFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        When a file has been deleted, it will be removed from the map of all files in the system, and the next node will be notified.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that was deleted.

      • getNeighbourList

        public void getNeighbourList()
        Retrieves the list of files from the next node and updates its own list of files. The list of locks for each file will also be updated.

      • lockFile

        public boolean lockFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Sets the lock for a file. Makes a JSON object with the file name and the lock status. Then it will send a UDP message to the multicast group.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file that is being locked.
        Returns:
        true if the lock was successful, false otherwise.

      • unlockFile

        public boolean unlockFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Unlocks a file. Makes a JSON object with the file name and the lock status. Then it will send a UDP message to the multicast group.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file to unlock.
        Returns:
        True if the file was unlocked, false otherwise.
